text: U denʹ velykoho khadzhzhu Allah i Yoho Poslanetsʹ proholosyatʹ lyudyam, shcho Allah i Yoho Poslanetsʹ zrikayutʹsya bahatobozhnykiv. Yakshcho vy pokayetesya, to tse bude krashche dlya vas! A yakshcho vidvernetesʹ, to znayte, shcho vam ne poslabyty Allaha! Spovisty zh tym, yaki ne viruyutʹ, dobru zvistku pro bolisnu karu
